name: Classic YouTube Tweaks
description:
Little tweaks to make the youtube experience better (if you liked the old youtube.)

It doesn't work with the new Material Design UI, you need to downgrade using this extension for Firefox and Chrome.

Make sure you also install THIS / THIS / THIS to get the description in the side bar and other stuff like the favicon and the word 'views' removed (I recommend turning off the Retro Style in the "More" option under a video) (Install it using Tampermonkey).
